sobreMi p1: A while ago I decided to make a big change in my life: quit my job as a branch supervisor to pursue my passion: programming.
sobreMi p2: Today I'm 100% focused on my studies as a programmer, especially in the backend area, which is what I'm most passionate about.
sobreMi p3: I like to understand how things work ‚Äúunder the hood,‚Äù working on the logic and structure of applications, although I also have front-end knowledge and enjoy creating entire projects on my own.
sobreMi p4: Although I don't have any work experience in IT yet, I'm constantly learning, developing my own projects, and challenging myself. I consider myself detail-oriented, curious, and practical: when I don't know how to do something, I find a way and figure it out.
sobreMi p5: My goal is to take that first professional step in the IT world and continue growing along this path that excites me so much.
proyectoDescripcion1: Application to report and search for lost and found pets.
proyectoDescripcion2: Fullstack application for book management, including create, edit, and delete features.
proyectoDescripcion3: Task management tool built with a fullstack approach, allowing users to organize their daily activities.
